channel.title: CVE Feed for Fujitsu -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fujitsu -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4092|2023-09-19T13:00:47.858Z -- fujitsu -- arconte%20%C3%A1urea
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Arconte Áurea, in its 1.5.0.0 version. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to read sensitive data from the database, modify data (insert/update/delete), perform database administration operations and, in some cases, execute commands on the operating system.

item.title: CVE-2023-4093|2023-09-19T13:00:27.476Z -- fujitsu -- arconte%20%C3%A1urea
item.description: Reflected and persistent XSS vulnerability in Arconte Áurea, in its 1.5.0.0 version. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to inject malicious JavaScript code, compromise the victim's browser and take control of it, redirect the user to malicious domains or access information being viewed by the legitimate user.

item.title: CVE-2023-4094|2023-09-19T13:15:00.556Z -- fujitsu -- arconte%20%C3%A1urea
item.description: ARCONTE Aurea's authentication system, in its 1.5.0.0 version, could allow an attacker to make incorrect access requests in order to block each legitimate account and cause a denial of service. In addition, a resource has been identified that could allow circumventing the attempt limit set in the login form.

item.title: CVE-2023-4095|2023-09-19T13:22:30.888Z -- fujitsu -- arconte%20%C3%A1urea
item.description: User enumeration vulnerability in Arconte Áurea 1.5.0.0 version. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to obtain a list of registered users in the application, obtaining the necessary information to perform more complex attacks on the platform.

item.title: CVE-2023-4096|2023-09-19T13:24:18.900Z -- fujitsu -- arconte%20%C3%A1urea
item.description: Weak password recovery mechanism vulnerability in Fujitsu Arconte Áurea version 1.5.0.0, which exploitation could allow an attacker to perform a brute force attack on the emailed PIN number in order to change the password of a legitimate user.
